title: Software Development Competency Enhancement: Machine Learning Design Strategies for Improving TWIP Steel Properties

context.prior_knowledge: Basic metallurgy and engineering materials knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can interpret microstructure-mechanical property relationship patterns in TWIP steel using SHAP analysis techniques.
Learners can build predictive models for yield strength, tensile strength, and elongation using machine learning models.

Learners can propose alloy designs that simultaneously satisfy two performance metrics (yield strength ≥ 550 MPa, strength-ductility product ≥ 50,000 MPa%) using multi-objective optimization strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
